attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like this government to give the people of England Democracy. We the the people of England want a voice we want what you have given Iraq (Democracy). The right to vote on affairs that affect England only. We wish to be treated the same as the rest of the UK, who you permit to vote on there own matters. Without outside voting from English mp's. It is only fair you give the people the same rights.
We are the only nation within the EU not to be heard we want to be recognised we want a democratic English parliament where English mp's can vote on such matters as education transport and health.
We want fairness and respect something that is missing in this union since power was devolved to the other nations.
Except are Englishness and except we want democracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
